page.title: 18Leisure in Nether Kellet
page.content: There are plenty of opportunities for {recreation }for people of all ages in Nether Kellet. When you are very young you can go to playschool. Then, as you grow older, there are cubs, brownies, scouts and Youth clubs. There is a Women's Institute and there are whist drives for older residents. Through the year we have bonfire night parties, dances and discos. We have a mobile library which comes to our village every week. There are Field Days and a New Year's Eve party. There is also a sports day at the school. On Shrove Tuesday the Women's Institute organise pancake races on the village green. In the summer there are many teams who enter a rounders league. They play on the village green.
